Threat: Employees: either through negligence or malice a system administrator allows an unauthorised party access to their private key
Countermeasure: Activities are logged and each administrator has a personal key, administrators are trained
Additional Countermeasures: Implement monitoring to automatically detect suspicious behaviour of administrators.

Threat: Governmental Agencies, Skilled Hacker: perform targeted attack on system administrators to gain access to the internal system and plant a backdoor
Countermeasure: To access other servers, additionally to the SSH key, they also have to know the sudo password of this particular administrator's account on the jump host as well as the passphrase for the ansible user's SSH key
Additional Countermeasures: Raise administrator's awareness to phishing attacks. Implement policy to change SSH keys regularly. Restrict the software running on devices of system administrators.
